9 - note intern ?

in main task all 3 notes buttons are enabled again.

Temp table filled already? Yes-> Restart! / No->Get data into temp table now:

and in the invoices screens enable the "Transfer" invoices Button!

This handler behaves like a subtask, called from Control Change Handler of GNOTE
and the Select-Contact-Button.
Exchange the second line:
Skip Line 1:
Skip line Line 2:
SELECT CONTACT Button.
1 = CLIENT:
control rights:
If user has the rights to choose a person, then proceed:
Delete person-no, then show selection list:
If Contactperson was changed, write it to the temp table and
let the parent task update the related person data in the table:
:End: Empty person-no...
2 = DEBTOR:
Close Event is PROPAGETED! It Exists the task.
Tel the upper task to close the window now:
Icon-Bar Button: Print
Ask for confirmation of cancelation, when changes had been done already:
Do the cancelation, if answer was Yes or if nothing had been changed at all:
Show upper task, that the user canceled (and delete temp tables):
After cancelation of any changes, reset the flag:
Save window position and then close window:
General will start the saving of data in the parent task:
Close-Event will close the window:
leave the table after the last field of a line:
STEP-Mode! It shall not exit, when just going to another line.
Especially it shall not "exit" after a change in the line was done and the user
just goes to another table line afterwards
This "trick" is used to show or not show the button (even not as an ugly empty
button, as it is the default, when no records are is the scope):
Now the first update forces an update of the object on the screen,
the second update can then decide, wether to show or not show the button
on the screen after leaving the task (to another window).
So the button will only be shown, if there are records in fact:
Show the delete-button (cause if RP here is entered, there ARE records in fact):
Reset Delete-function in case F3 had been hit before:
From now on, let the cancel-Button will ask for confirmation:
From now on, let the cancel-Button will ask for confirmation:
Additional exit for leaving this subtask and propagate the event to parent task.
Ok - Button
Additional exit for leaving this subtask and propagate the event to parent task.
This task tests, if the person was already selected. In this case the virtual
fields are filled accordingly. (This is the case of reclick into this window.)
If not, the process to find the person is started, and after that, the virtuals
are filled with data. (The window is opened first time.)
There is Maximum 1 record in the file, so no locate is needed:
Link return value is output parameter for parent task!
Delete flag in case of old data:
Main screen can be started directly, cause a unique person was found and
no selection of a person has to be done before main screen:
Starts the routines, so that in the end the header is filled with data.
Test, if a person was selected already or not.
If it was selected already, get it's data into the headers virtuells.
If it was not selected yet, start selection process and in the end
get data into the headers virtuells also.
Translate Recipient to description on the screen:
Client = 1:
First search for person WITH department...:
...then - if no person was selected - search WITHOUT department:
...selection screen, if there is no client person at all,to create a new person:
:End: no client person at all.
note to Debtor = 2:
First search for client debtor...:
...then - if no client debtor was selected or found - search for Heller debtor:
...selection screen, if there is no debtor person at all,to create a new person:
Filter criteria for the select program:
Result / Selected person:
Select a person:
...and save the selected person to temp table:
User did not choose any contact person - open note without contact
Debtor found must be set to TRUE, to start the online screen
Lawer=4, Internal User = 5, etc.:
Task searches for a client person with suitable data-properties.
(This is done be a loop that runs max. 2 times)
If it finds 1 person only, the search is done.
If it finds more than 1 person, the user has to select one of those.
If 1 unique person was found, it can be saved immediately:
If 2 (or more) persons were found, let the user select one,
if no person was found, he may create one new person on the fly:
Control rights and proceed, if legal:
At least the user needs query rights to user the selection table for persons:
If 2 persons have been found, the user has to select 1 of those:
If a contact person was selected, write it into the temp memory table:
:End: More than 1 Client
Searches for a debtor by DEBC_NO.
If more than 1 debtor, a selection list appears.
If 1 unique person was found, it can be saved immediately:
If more than 1 person was found, the user can select one:
Prepare search parameters:
Filter criteria for the following select program:
Result / Selected person:
Select a person:
...and save the selected person to temp table:
:End 1 or more debtors
Get data from current debtor:
